meanings.definition: The science concerned with improving living conditions for humans.
meanings.sent1: Euthenics teaches us how to create healthier homes for people.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in euthenics work to enhance the quality of life through better living environments.
meanings.sent3: Learning about euthenics can help us design more comfortable and safe houses.
meanings.sent4: In a world where euthenics is prioritized, every home becomes a sanctuary of well-being.
meanings.sent5: The impact of euthenics on society is profound, shaping our daily lives for the better.

meanings.definition: The study of environmental factors that influence human health and well-being.
meanings.sent1: Understanding euthenics helps us grasp how surroundings affect our health.
meanings.sent2: Euthenics explores how nature and surroundings impact our well-being.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating to see how euthenics connects our health to the environment around us.
meanings.sent4: The concept of euthenics paints a vivid picture of how our surroundings shape our health.
meanings.sent5: Through euthenics, we realize the crucial link between our environment and our well-being.
